sentences.english: That beggar-thy-neighbor agenda encourages others to pursue similar policies.
sentences.chinese: 这也促使了其他一些国家采取这种以邻为壑的政策。

sentences.english: In a deep recession, this is a "beggar-my-neighbour" policy.
sentences.chinese: 在深度衰退时期，这是一种“以邻为壑”的政策。
这是一项以邻为壑的政策。

sentences.english: At a minimum, both must avoid beggar-thy-neighbor policies.
sentences.chinese: 最起码要避免采取以邻为壑的政策。

sentences.english: Everyone knows that protectionism and beggar-thy-neighbour policies exacerbated the Depression.
sentences.chinese: 所有人都知道贸易保护主义和以邻为壑会恶化经济。

sentences.english: The risk, as in the 1930s, is of “beggar-thy-neighbour” devaluations.
sentences.chinese: 风险就是20世纪30年代的以邻为壑的货币贬值。
